meanings.definition: A type of footwear worn on the feet.
meanings.sent1: I put on my chaussures before going outside.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of chaussures for the party.
meanings.sent3: The chaussures danced off the shelf when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her chaussures were like two loyal friends, always by her side.
meanings.sent5: The colorful chaussures brightened up the dull hallway.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the French word for shoes.
meanings.sent1: In France, people often refer to shoes as chaussures.
meanings.sent2: He packed his bag with clothes and chaussures for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The chaussures in the store seemed to whisper to each other in French.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of chaussures was a reflection of her eclectic taste.
meanings.sent5: The sound of chaussures clicking on the pavement echoed through the street.
